channel.title: Hoster for a Back-UP Moparcraft Server
channel.description:
Well, since Mitb's server time's out alot shouldn't we decide a hoster for a BACK-UP?
I'd be willing to do it.
Discuss.

item.title: Hoster for a Back-UP Moparcraft Server
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I code, no offence, but you were a major prick to people on both my server, and on the official server, so I wouldn’t be surprised if nobody wanted to play with you in charge.

@david, there was no point in me keeping it. I messed up attempting to use hMod, so the server won’t even run, so I asked for the removal of the topic.[/quote]

A major prick, eh? Weren’t you the one calling me a “fucking faggot” and when you come to a house i build (in offical) and kill me with a friend, yeah i’m going to get pissed.

Read full topic
item.source: Hoster for a Back-UP Moparcraft Server

item.title: Hoster for a Back-UP Moparcraft Server
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:379890”]If we actually needed a backup, I would just host the server on my linux server again (3gb dedi ram, fast internet, wired) and I already have the older maps/mods and auth information etc

For now, I suggest we just wait for MITB to figure out what he wants to do[/quote]

Alright sounds good, i was just making a suggestion :|.

Read full topic
item.source: Hoster for a Back-UP Moparcraft Server

item.title: Hoster for a Back-UP Moparcraft Server
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

I could use a 6gb ram computer if i wished to, i was planning on hosting it on this laptop has 2 gb of ram.

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:4, topic:379890”]staff hunters gunna staff hunt.

I Vain I already put up a back up server from what I have heard… no need for this…[/quote]

He removed it.

Read full topic
item.source: Hoster for a Back-UP Moparcraft Server

item.title: Hoster for a Back-UP Moparcraft Server
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]David said their is no purpose in a backup, thus I had my topic removed. Anywho you said you had 512mb ram…

I have 4G (only used 1G for the server) and you guys still lagged the shit out of it.[/quote]I said there was no purpose for a backup once we get the auto restarter and/or some way to restart the server without MITB being there… seeing as how neither of those has happened yet, why did you get your topic removed?

Read full topic
